title: Careers @ Milan Direct
content:
Careers at Milan Direct

 

Do you have a passion for e-commerce and designer products?

 

Milan Direct has been operating in Australia since 2007, and commenced operations in Europe in 2009, from its Headquarters in Melbourne, Australia.

 

Since launch, Milan Direct has grown to offer hundreds of designer products for the home, office and outdoors, to customers in Australia, New Zealand, the United Kingdom and throughout Europe.

 

With a commitment to offering the best possible value for high quality products, Milan Direct has been recognised as Australia's largest Online Furniture Retailer and Australia's fastest growing Furniture Retailer (as reported in BRW and AFR).

 

We believe that a quality designer lifestyle should be attainable by everyone. Designer Lifestyle… Live it!

 

Milan Direct is always looking for internet savvy, bright and enthusiastic staff to join our ever growing team. If you have skills in customer service, e-commerce operations, internet marketing, or product management, then we would love to hear from you!

 

Send your resume and a cover letter introducing yourself and explaining how you believe you could add value to the Milan Direct team to careers@milandirect.com.au.

title: Milan Direct Terms & Conditions
content:
Milan Direct Website and Order Terms and Conditions

 

 

1. Agreement
2. Interpretation
3. Site Use
4. Pricing 
5. Product Specifications
6. Orders
7. Payment
8. Delivery and ownership of the goods
9. Refunds and returns
10. Warranties
11. Intellectual Property
12. Indemnity
13. Liability
14. Privacy
15. General
 


 1.    Agreement


1.1.    These Terms and Conditions apply to you, the Website user and your usage of the Milan Direct and associated software, networks and processes, including the purchase of goods or services through the Website.


1.2.    By browsing the Website, or placing an Order, you agree to these Terms and Conditions as set out below.


BACK TO TOP

 

 

 2.    Interpretation


2.1.    In these Terms and Conditions:

“Agreement” means these terms and conditions, including all the terms of any order placed by you the User through the Website (if applicable).


 “Customer” means the person or legal entity identified in a Milan Direct quote, invoice or sales document.


 “Delivery Cost” means the costs associated with delivery as specified in an Order.


 “Goods” means the Products listed in an Order.


 “Intellectual Property” means all rights in patent, copyright, trade names, trademarks, logos, designs, images (including still images, and audio and audio-visual media).


 “Material” means any information (including but not limited to data, source codes, and drawings) or images in any form (whether visible or not) stored on or in use with the Website.


 “Pre-sale” means items that are sold in anticipation of being in stock on or near to the dispatch date stated in the Product  listing on the Website.


 “Products” means any items listed on the Website (for sale or otherwise), including extended warranties.


 “Website” means the internet site located at the URL www.milandirect.com.au and operated by Milan Direct.



 2.2.    Any reference in this Agreement to the singular includes the plural, to any gender includes all genders, to any act or statute includes any Act or statute which supercedes, replaces or modifies any earlier Act or statute, to persons includes all bodies and associations both corporate and incorporated and vice versa. Paragraph headings are for reference purposes only and all references to clauses are to clauses in this Agreement unless otherwise specified.

 

 BACK TO TOP

 


3.    Site Use


3.1.    The Website may contain links to other web sites. Those links are provided for convenience only and may not remain current or be maintained. Milan Direct will not be responsible for the content or privacy practices associated with linked web sites.


3.2.    You must ensure that your access to, or use of the Website is not illegal or prohibited by laws which apply to you.


3.3.    You must take your own precautions to ensure that your process for accessing the Website does not expose you to risk of viruses, malicious computer code or other forms of interference which may damage your computer system. Milan Direct takes no responsibility for any such damage which may arise in connection with your use of the Website.


 BACK TO TOP


 
4.    Pricing


4.1.    All prices listed on the Website are in Austrlian Dollars unless otherwise specified.

4.2.    All prices listed on the Website include all applicable taxes unless otherwise specified.


4.3.    All prices displayed on the Milan Direct website are subject to change without notice. Prices for items in an Order are fixed once your Order has been confirmed. Subsequent price changes either up or down will not be retroactively applied to confirmed Orders.


4.4.    If a Discount Code is entered at the checkout, it has the effect of applying a discount equally across the entire Order, including both Goods and associated Delivery Cost.


4.5.    You agree to pay delivery charges as they are calculated and listed in the Order confirmation at the time of purchase. 


4.6     Free shipping offers are given at the sole discretion of Milan Direct and may incur additional charges for delivery to remote areas as defined by Milan Direct.


4.7     Milan Direct reserves the right to refuse a sale.


 BACK TO TOP


 
5.    Product Specifications


5.1.    Features and specifications of Products described or depicted on the Website are subject to change without notice.


5.2.    All weights and dimensions mentioned are approximate.


  BACK TO TOP

 


6.    Orders


6.1.    You may place an Order by filling in the Order Form on the Milan Direct Website and clicking the "confirm" button. When you place your Order, we will issue you with an Order Number. We will do this by email. By placing an Order, you make an offer to us to purchase the Products you have selected based on these Terms and Conditions


6.2.    Orders will be deemed to have been received by Milan Direct at the time Milan Direct sends an Order confirmation to your nominated e-mail address.


6.3.    Milan Direct is an online business and will primarily communicate with customers via e-mail. It is the customer’s responsibility to ensure the correct contact details are entered and that the nominated e-mail address is regularly checked for correspondence.


6.4.    Each Order (once confirmed) represents a separate agreement.


6.5.    Milan Direct reserves the right to not accept or to cancel Orders that request commercial quantities of Goods.


6.6.    Milan Direct, at its sole discretion, may cancel your Order at any time prior to dispatch of the Goods, including Products that are sold on Pre-sale.


6.7.    In the event of a cancelled Order, funds paid in relation to that Order will be refunded in full as soon as is reasonably practicable. You will be provided with e-mail acknowledgement of the cancellation and refund.


6.8.    Milan Direct reserves the right to at any time alter the specification in respect of the Goods without giving notice to the Customer, in the interest of continual improvement.  An alternation does not entitle the Customer to return Products, cancel an Order or otherwise avoid its obligations and liabilities pursuant to these Terms and Conditions.


6.9.    Milan Direct accepts no responsibility for Orders that are declined or not accepted due to disruptions with internet connections.


 BACK TO TOP
   


7.    Payment


7.1.   Milan Direct currently accepts Visa/Mastercard and Direct Deposit via EFT.


7.2.    Payment for Orders will be processed immediately upon confirmation of your Order, including for Products that are listed as on Pre-sale.


7.3.    If your nominated payment method triggers Milan Direct internal suspect transaction protocols, Milan Direct may contact you to confirm additional details, or rescind the transaction.


 BACK TO TOP


 
8.    Delivery and ownership of the goods


8.1.    All purchasers via the Milan Direct website include a separate dispatch service (the Service), a service which is distinct from the supply of Goods, and which includes only the dispatch of the order with a third party carrier, and the provision to the carrier of instructions to enable the delivery of the Goods to the customer by the carrier.


8.2.    Once an order has been dispatched to the customer by Milan Direct in accordance with 8.1, the dispatch service is deemed to have been provided, and in no circumstances is Milan Direct then liable to refund the delivery fee paid by the customer.


8.3.    Milan Direct is not responsible for the delivery and delivery times of Goods once dispatched in accordance with 8.1. Once Goods have been dispatched, it is the customer's responsibility to liaise with Milan Direct’s nominated courier company in relation to date of delivery and to make themselves available to take delivery during business hours or otherwise in accordance with the carrier’s instructions. Any information provided by Milan Direct to a customer in relation to delivery will be from a third party, and as such Milan Direct will not guarantee the accuracy of such information. Milan Direct will provide customers with tracking information to enable liaising with the carrier.


8.4.    The parties acknowledge that delays in shipping do occasionally occur, and Milan Direct is not liable for any loss and damage caused by the delivery delays, nor to refund any amounts paid for the order or delivery of the order.


8.5.    The parties acknowledge that Goods may be damaged in transit by the carriers, and in such a case, the customer may contact Milan Direct in accordance with Clause 9, and other than in accordance with that clause, Milan Direct is not liable in any way to provide a refund or for any other damage caused thereby or for any corresponding delays caused by the carrying out of the process outlined in Clause 9.


8.6.    The date of dispatch listed on the website is the estimated date of dispatch as is reasonably estimated by Milan Direct and is subject to change without notice. Where scheduled dispatch of a Product is delayed by more than 1 week, customers will be notified by e-mail at the e-mail address nominated in their Order.


8.7.    Milan Direct will not dispatch Goods to PO box addresses.


8.8.    Title and risk in the Goods pass to the customer on signing for delivery of the Goods.


8.9.    Where a customer gives written authority for an item to be delivered without a signature, any and all included insurance cover will be voided upon the item being left as instructed.


8.10.    Milan Direct's nominated courier will deliver Goods during business hours (9am to 5pm, Monday to Friday), unless otherwise arranged in advance with Milan Direct.


8.11.    Where a customer wishes to cancel an order after it has been dispatched in accordance with 8.1, the cancellation is treated in accordance with the 14 Day Money Back Guarantee, whereby shipping costs and return or redirection costs are not refunded and/or are payable by the customer.


8.12.    The Service and delivery of Goods by third party carriers includes only delivery to ground floor and/or the front door (a door-to-door service) by a single delivery driver, and does not include carrying items inside, upstairs, in elevators, placement, assembly, removal of wrapping or the like. It is always the customers responsibility to arrange for a means (whether by requesting assistance from neighbours or friends or otherwise) to bring Goods inside (or in the case of a return, outside) from (or in the case of a return, to) the front door or grounds floor of residences or buildings.


8.13.    For all items deemed “Oversize” (being a Good weighing over 25kg), the customer is also required to assist (or to arrange for someone to assist) the carrying of the Goods from the delivery vehicle to the front door, unless the customer has arranged for alternative and/or premium service in advance of dispatch with Milan Direct.


 BACK TO TOP

 

9.    Refunds and returns


9.1.    Other than in accordance with Milan Direct’s 30 Day Money Back Guarantee, (or when a fault is deemed a major fault), Milan Direct is not required to provide refunds.


9.2.    No refunds are available for services where goods are not offered.


9.3.    In order to facilitate a return under these Terms and Conditions, Customers must e-mail support@milandirect.com.au


9.4.    The customer must comply with directions from Milan Direct staff to facilitate a return.


9.5.    Returned Goods must be returned in their original packaging with all accessories, and must be in a re-saleable condition. If a returned item is found not to be re-saleable by Milan Direct (at its sole discretion), Milan Direct reserves the right to refund only 50% or less of the product price paid by the customer.


9.6.    If the customer arranges to return the Goods themselves, it is the customer’s responsibility to ensure that returned items are returned safely and in re-saleable condition. Milan Direct takes no responsibility for items lost in transit.


9.7     Milan Direct considers that an item that has been damaged in transit, or contains a fault that is unique to the actual item sent to the customer, and therefore would not be expected to be a fault existing in a replacement, not to be a major fault in any circumstances notwithstanding the extent of said damage.


9.8     Due to environmental considerations, Milan Direct does not pick-up furniture deemed, in Milan Direct’s sole discretion, to be damaged or faulty beyond repair, and the customer is responsible for disposal (for example, by utilising publicly available hard-waste collection or disposal processes in the customers area).


 BACK TO TOP
   


10.    Warranties


10.1.    Each Product sold on the Website is covered by a 12 month Milan Direct Standard Warranty, which can be extended to 2 or 3 years at checkout. This is an addition to the warranties guaranteed under the Australian Consumer Law.


10.2.    Milan Direct warrants all goods for the period of the warranty under normal usage, to be free from defects in material and workmanship.


10.3.    Milan Direct’s liability under this warranty is to repair, provide spare or replacement parts, or replace entirely any part or product covered by this warranty free of charge (subject to clause 11.8).


10.4.    This warranty does not cover:


(a)    Normal wear and tear;


(b)    Damage arising from abnormal use, or abuse, or placement in inappropriate locations;


(c)    Products which have not been maintained, or which have been modified;


10.5.    Milan Direct requires any customer requesting services in accordance with this warranty to provide to comply with directions from Milan Direct staff in order to facilitate the investigation of the warranty claim, and the provision of repair and/or spare parts and/or replacement solutions from Milan Direct (where applicable). Such directions will usually include the provision by the customer of a detailed description of the warranty service requested and photos and videos (where appropriate).


10.6.    Milan Direct is not required to provide warranty services in accordance with this warranty unless the customer complies with the previous sub-paragraph, because in the absence of provision by customers of the description and images, Milan Direct is unable to investigate and provide an appropriate solution.


10.7.    Our goods come with guarantees that cannot be excluded under the Australian Consumer Law. You are entitled to a replacement or refund for a major failure and compensation for any other reasonably foreseeable loss or damage. You are also entitled to have the goods repaired or replaced if goods fail to be of acceptable quality and the failure does not amount to a major failure.


10.8.   Insignificant variations in advertised dimensions or colour or grain or finish (as between Goods received by a Customer and images or descriptions shown on the Milan Direct website), or damage to packaging only, is not covered by this Warranty.


 BACK TO TOP
   


11.    Intellectual Property


11.1.    All Intellectual Property in any Material on the Website is the property of Milan Direct. Unless expressly authorised under this Agreement or otherwise, you may not reproduce adapt, modify, display, perform or distribute any Material or any part of any Material.


 BACK TO TOP
   


12.    Indemnity


12.1.    You waive, release, discharge and relinquish any and all claims that you have now or may have against Milan Direct which are connected with, arise out of, relate to or are incidental to the use of the Website.


12.2.    You agree to indemnify and to keep indemnified Milan Direct and hold harmless from and against any and all claims, loss, damage, taxes, liability and/or expense that may be incurred by Milan Direct arising out of or in connection with the your use of the Website and the use of any Milan Direct Products outside the manufacturer’s specifications (as specified in Product manuals and as notified to you from time to time).


 BACK TO TOP
   


13.    Liability


13.1.    To the extent permitted by law we will not be liable for any loss of income, loss of profits, loss of contracts, loss of data or for any indirect or consequential loss or damage of any kind howsoever arising and whether caused by tort (including negligence), breach of contract or otherwise; and our maximum aggregate liability for any Product supplied to you whether in contract, tort (including negligence) or otherwise shall in no circumstances exceed the amount payable by you to us in respect of the Product(s) in question.


13.2.   For the avoidance of doubt, nothing in this clause limits or restricts Your ability to make a claim that may be available to You for Our failure to comply with a guarantee under the Australian Consumer Law.


 BACK TO TOP
   


14.    Privacy


14.1.    We gather personal information about our customers for the purposes of:


(a)    marketing, supplying or delivering our products to you;


(b)    carrying out repair work (both in and out of warranty repairs);


(c)    improving and developing our products; and


(d)    expanding our business.


14.2.    Milan Direct is committed to protecting your privacy and personal information because of our legal and ethical commitment to comply with relevant law and more importantly, because we know that you care how information about you may be used and shared.


Milan Direct will not sell, rent, share, or otherwise disclose personally identifiable information in violation of the commitments set forth in this clause 16.


14.3.    In the process of dealing with our customers, we may collect and hold the following types of information:


(a)    Information about persons who are customers or target customers as given to us by those persons, or information obtained from public domain sources such as magazines and newspapers.


(b)    Information about roles, means of communication with, and personal attributes of officers, employees and other representatives of corporations with whom we deal, collected incidentally in the course of dealing with those corporations.


15.4.    The aforementioned information may be held in electronic records in data storage systems and hard copy which permit lawful access only by those company officers, employees and contractors who need access to perform their functions.


14.5.    We may, from time-to-time, employ other companies and individuals to perform functions on our behalf. For example we may retain a third party repairer to provide warranty repair. In these circumstances we may disclose personal information to such companies and individuals to enable them to deliver services on our behalf.


14.6.    You are able to request access to your personal information, in accordance with the National Privacy Principles in the Privacy Act 1988. If you wish to access your personal information please contact us at by e-mail at sales@milandirect.com.au. A $30.00 administration fee will be charged for the retrieval of any personal information.


 BACK TO TOP
   


15.    General


15.1.    Milan Direct reserves the right to make changes to the Milan Direct Website and Order Terms and Conditions without notice.


15.2.    Any provision of this Agreement which is void or unenforceable may be severed from this Agreement without affecting the enforceability of other provisions.


15.3.    A failure or delay by Milan Direct to exercise a power or right under this Agreement does not operate as a waiver of that power or right, and the exercise of a power or right by Milan Direct does not preclude its future ability to exercise that or any other power or right.


 BACK TO TOP
 

Our goods come with guarantees that cannot be excluded under the Australian Consumer Law. You are entitled to a replacement or refund for a major failure and compensation for any other reasonably foreseeable loss or damage. You are also entitled to have the goods repaired or replaced if goods fail to be of acceptable quality and the failure does not amount to a major failure.

Milan Direct Website and Order Terms and Conditions

 

 

1. Agreement
2. Interpretation
3. Site Use
4. Pricing 
5. Product Specifications
6. Orders
7. Payment
8. Delivery and ownership of the goods
9. Faulty or damaged goods
10. Refunds and returns
11. Warranties
12. Intellectual Property
13. Indemnity
14. Liability
15. Privacy
16. General
 


 1.    Agreement


1.1.    These Terms and Conditions apply to you, the Website user and your usage of the Milan Direct and associated software, networks and processes, including the purchase of goods or services through the Website.


1.2.    By browsing the Website, or placing an Order, you agree to these Terms and Conditions as set out below.


BACK TO TOP

 

 

 2.    Interpretation


2.1.    In these Terms and Conditions:

“Agreement” means these terms and conditions, including all the terms of any order placed by you the User through the Website (if applicable).


 “Customer” means the person or legal entity identified in a Milan Direct quote, invoice or sales document.


 “Delivery Cost” means the costs associated with delivery as specified in an Order.


 “Goods” means the Products listed in an Order.


 “Intellectual Property” means all rights in patent, copyright, trade names, trademarks, logos, designs, images (including still images, and audio and audio-visual media).

 “Products” means any items listed on the Website (for sale or otherwise), including extended warranties.


 “Website” means the internet site located at the URL www.milandirect.co.uk and operated by Milan Direct UK.



 2.2.    Any reference in this Agreement to the singular includes the plural, to any gender includes all genders, to any act or statute includes any Act or statute which supercedes, replaces or modifies any earlier Act or statute, to persons includes all bodies and associations both corporate and incorporated and vice versa. Paragraph headings are for reference purposes only and all references to clauses are to clauses in this Agreement unless otherwise specified.

 

 BACK TO TOP

 


3.    Site Use


3.1.    The Website may contain links to other web sites. Those links are provided for convenience only and may not remain current or be maintained. Milan Direct will not be responsible for the content or privacy practices associated with linked web sites.


3.2.    You must ensure that your access to, or use of the Website is not illegal or prohibited by laws which apply to you.


3.3.    You must take your own precautions to ensure that your process for accessing the Website does not expose you to risk of viruses, malicious computer code or other forms of interference which may damage your computer system. Milan Direct takes no responsibility for any such damage which may arise in connection with your use of the Website.


 BACK TO TOP


 
4.    Pricing


4.1.    All prices listed on the Website are in British Pounds unless otherwise specified.

4.2.    All prices listed on the Website include all applicable taxes, where applicable. Please note that for orders to locations outside the UK, the price may not include VAT or any taxes, as taxes may not be applicable for whatever reason.


4.3.    All prices displayed on the Milan Direct website are subject to change without notice. Prices for items in an Order are fixed once your Order has been confirmed. Subsequent price changes either up or down will not be retroactively applied to confirmed Orders.


4.4.    If a Discount Code is entered at the checkout, it has the effect of applying a discount equally across the entire Order, including both Goods and associated Delivery Cost.


4.5.    You agree to pay delivery charges as they are calculated and listed in the Order confirmation at the time of purchase. 


4.6     Free shipping offers are given at the sole discretion of Milan Direct and may incur additional charges for delivery to remote areas as defined by Milan Direct.


4.7     Milan Direct reserves the right to refuse a sale.


 BACK TO TOP


 
5.    Product Specifications


5.1.    Features and specifications of Products described or depicted on the Website are subject to change without notice.


5.2.    All weights and dimensions mentioned are approximate.


  BACK TO TOP

 


6.    Orders


6.1.    You may place an Order by filling in the Order Form on the Milan Direct Website and clicking the "confirm" button. When you place your Order, we will issue you with an Order Number. We will do this by email. By placing an Order, you make an offer to us to purchase the Products you have selected based on these Terms and Conditions


6.2.    Orders will be deemed to have been received by Milan Direct at the time Milan Direct sends an Order confirmation to your nominated e-mail address.


6.3.    Milan Direct is an online business and will primarily communicate with customers via e-mail. It is the customer’s responsibility to ensure the correct contact details are entered and that the nominated e-mail address is regularly checked for correspondence.


6.4.    Each Order (once confirmed) represents a separate agreement.


6.5.    Milan Direct reserves the right to not accept or to cancel Orders that request commercial quantities of Goods.


6.6.    Milan Direct, at its sole discretion, may cancel your Order at any time prior to dispatch of the Goods, including Products that are sold on Pre-sale.


6.7.    In the event of a cancelled Order, funds paid in relation to that Order will be refunded in full as soon as is reasonably practicable. You will be provided with e-mail acknowledgement of the cancellation and refund.


6.8.    Milan Direct reserves the right to at any time alter the specification in respect of the Goods without giving notice to the Customer, in the interest of continual improvement.  An alternation does not entitle the Customer to return Products, cancel an Order or otherwise avoid its obligations and liabilities pursuant to these Terms and Conditions.


6.9.    Milan Direct accepts no responsibility for Orders that are declined or not accepted due to disruptions with internet connections.


 BACK TO TOP
   


7.    Payment


7.1.   Milan Direct currently accepts Visa/Mastercard and Direct Deposit via EFT.


7.2.    Payment for Orders will be processed immediately upon confirmation of your Order, including for Products that are listed as on Pre-sale.


7.3.    If your nominated payment method triggers Milan Direct internal suspect transaction protocols, Milan Direct may contact you to confirm additional details, or rescind the transaction.


 BACK TO TOP


 
8.    Delivery and ownership of the goods


8.1.    Milan Direct will make available products ordered for pick-up by the customers selected carrier from its UK based warehouse. The customers is responsible and title and risk in the goods pass to the customer upon pick-up from the warehouse by the customer’s carrier. From the point of pick-up, the customer is responsible for liaising with the carrier, and for any taxes, duties, or other costs that may be associated with the delivery of the products.


8.2.    The date of dispatch listed on the website is the estimated date of dispatch as is reasonably estimated by Milan Direct and is subject to change without notice. Where scheduled dispatch of a Product is delayed by more than 1 week, customers will be notified by e-mail at the e-mail address nominated in their Order.


8.3.    Milan Direct will not dispatch Goods to PO box addresses.


8.4.    Title and risk in the Goods pass to the customer upon despatch from our UK warehouse.


8.5.    Where a customer gives written authority for an item to be delivered without a signature, any and all included insurance cover will be voided.


8.6.    Milan Direct's nominated courier will deliver Goods during business hours (9am to 5pm, Monday to Friday).


8.7.    Milan Direct is not responsible for the delivery times of Goods. Once Goods have been dispatched, it is the customer's responsibility to liaise with the relevant carrier, in relation to date of delivery and to make themselves available to take delivery during business hours. Any information provided by Milan Direct to a customer in relation to delivery will be from a third party, and as such Milan Direct will not guarantee the accuracy of such information.


 BACK TO TOP


   
9.    Faulty or damaged goods


9.1.    Milan Direct will repair or replace damaged or faulty Goods in accordance with these Terms and Conditions and the applicable  Milan Direct Standard Warranty or Extended Warranty.


9.2.    Where a Good is faulty within the first 30 days after delivery or is already damaged on delivery, and the customer notifies Milan Direct of that fault within the first 30 days after delivery, then Milan Direct will:


(a)    Replace or Repair the faulty Good at their discretion; or


(b)    If Milan Direct is unable to provide a new replacement, subject to applicable laws, Milan Direct has the option to offer a full or partial refund dependant on the amount of damage to the product.


(c)    Where a new replacement is available, and the customer elects to receive a refund instead of a replacement, the refund will be for the amount of the purchase price excluding the initial Delivery Cost.


(d)    The 30 Day period will commence on the date that the customer accepts delivery of their Milan Direct product. Where there is no proof of delivery, this date will be assumed to be 3 business days from the date of dispatch of the product.


Outside of this 30 Day period, faults will be dealt with in accordance with the terms and conditions of the applicable  Milan Direct Standard Warranty or Extended Warranty.

 

9.3.    Where Goods are already damaged on delivery, Milan Direct requires photographic evidence of the damage to be e-mailed to support@milandirect.co.uk before authorising return of the Goods.


9.4.   Milan Direct reserves sole discretion to determine whether the Goods are faulty or damaged in accordance with this clause 9.


9.5.    Milan Direct may seek reimbursement of any costs incurred by us when the Product is found to be in good working order.

 

9.6.    Insignificant variations in colour or grain or finish (as between Goods received by a Customer and images shown on the Milan Direct website), or damage to packaging only, is not a fault and is not covered by this clause. The Customer acknowledges that no two pieces of furniture are identical, and that items viewed on a computer screen image are not in all circumstances going to be identical to the direct view of that same item.


 BACK TO TOP

    

 

10.    Refunds and returns


10.1.    Other than in accordance with Milan Direct’s 30 Day Money Back Guarantee, Milan Direct does not provide refunds.


10.2.    No refunds are available for services where goods are not offered.


10.3.    Other than in accordance with clause 9, Milan Direct will only accept the return of Goods that have been supplied incorrectly.


10.4.    In order to facilitate a return under these Terms and Conditions, e-mail support@milandirect.co.uk.


10.5.    The customer must comply with directions from Milan Direct staff to facilitate a return. If a returned item is found not to be re-saleable by Milan Direct (at its sole discretion), Milan Direct reserves the right to refund only 50% or less of the product price paid by the customer.


10.6.    Returned Goods must be returned in their original packaging with all accessories, and must be in a re-saleable condition.


10.7.    It is the customer’s responsibility to ensure that returned items are returned safely. Milan Direct takes no responsibility for items lost in transit.


 BACK TO TOP
   


11.    Warranties


11.1.    Each Product sold on the Website and delivered into the UK is covered by a 12 month Milan Direct Standard Warranty (The warranty details can be viewed here).


11.2.    To the extent permitted by law, the warranties referred to in clause 11.1 are in substitution for all other terms, conditions and warranties, whether implied by statute or otherwise (including implied warranties with respect to merchantability and fitness for purpose) and all such terms, conditions and warranties are expressly excluded.


11.3.    Milan Direct will carry spare parts for each product for the length of the Standard and/or Extended Warranty period (1, 3 or 5 years as the case may be). Milan Direct does not guarantee the availability of spare parts outside of this period. Where a Product is outside of warranty, Milan Direct reserves the right to refuse to supply spare parts where limited stock is available.


11.4.    Certain legislation may imply warranties or conditions or impose obligations upon Milan Direct which cannot be excluded, restricted or modified or cannot be excluded, restricted or modified except to a limited extent. These Terms and Conditions must be read subject to those statutory provisions. If those statutory provisions apply, to the extent to which Milan Direct is able to do so, its liability will be limited, at its option to the replacement of the Goods or resupply of equivalent Goods; repair of the Goods; payment of the cost of replacing the Goods or acquiring equivalent Goods; or the payment of the cost of having the Goods repaired.


11.5.    Extended warranties are available for purchase for all Milan Direct Products, as listed on the Website. They may be purchased up to 30 days after delivery of your Products.


11.6.    Where a Milan Direct Extended Warranty is purchased, it will replace the 12 month Milan Direct Standard Warranty with the extended warranty period (For example, either 3 or 5 years).

 

11.7.    Due to environmental considerations, Milan Direct does not pick-up furniture deemed, in Milan Direct’s sole discretion, to be damaged or faulty beyond repair, and the customer is responsible for disposal (for example, by utilising publicly available hard-waste collection or disposal processes in the customers area).


11.8.   Insignificant variations in advertised dimensions or colour or grain or finish (as between Goods received by a Customer and images or descriptions shown on the Milan Direct website), or damage to packaging only, is not covered by this Warranty.


 BACK TO TOP
   


12.    Intellectual Property


12.1.    All Intellectual Property in any Material on the Website is the property of Milan Direct. Unless expressly authorised under this Agreement or otherwise, you may not reproduce adapt, modify, display, perform or distribute any Material or any part of any Material.


 BACK TO TOP
   


13.    Indemnity


13.1.    You waive, release, discharge and relinquish any and all claims that you have now or may have against Milan Direct which are connected with, arise out of, relate to or are incidental to the use of the Website.


13.2.    You agree to indemnify and to keep indemnified Milan Direct and hold harmless from and against any and all claims, loss, damage, taxes, liability and/or expense that may be incurred by Milan Direct arising out of or in connection with the your use of the Website and the use of any Milan Direct Products outside the manufacturer’s specifications (as specified in Product manuals and as notified to you from time to time).


 BACK TO TOP
   


14.    Liability


14.1.    To the extent permitted by law, all conditions or warranties expressed or implied by law are excluded and the liability of Milan Direct (in negligence or otherwise) is limited (at the option of Milan Direct) to the resupply of Goods, or the cost of having the Goods supplied again. You agree that Milan Direct shall not be held liable for any indirect or consequential loss.


15.2.    To the extent permitted by law, all conditions or warranties expressed or implied by law are excluded and the liability of Milan Direct (in negligence or otherwise) is limited (at the option of Milan Direct) to these Terms and Conditions and those listed in related Milan Direct warranties.


 BACK TO TOP
   


15.    Privacy


15.1.    We gather personal information about our customers for the purposes of:


(a)    marketing, supplying or delivering our products to you;


(b)    carrying out repair work (both in and out of warranty repairs);


(c)    improving and developing our products; and


(d)    expanding our business.


15.2.    Milan Direct is committed to protecting your privacy and personal information because of our legal and ethical commitment to comply with relevant law and more importantly, because we know that you care how information about you may be used and shared.


Milan Direct will not sell, rent, share, or otherwise disclose personally identifiable information in violation of the commitments set forth in this clause 16.


15.3.    In the process of dealing with our customers, we may collect and hold the following types of information:


(a)    Information about persons who are customers or target customers as given to us by those persons, or information obtained from public domain sources such as magazines and newspapers.


(b)    Information about roles, means of communication with, and personal attributes of officers, employees and other representatives of corporations with whom we deal, collected incidentally in the course of dealing with those corporations.


15.4.    The aforementioned information may be held in electronic records in data storage systems and hard copy which permit lawful access only by those company officers, employees and contractors who need access to perform their functions.


15.5.    We may, from time-to-time, employ other companies and individuals to perform functions on our behalf. For example we may retain a third party repairer to provide warranty repair. In these circumstances we may disclose personal information to such companies and individuals to enable them to deliver services on our behalf.



 BACK TO TOP
   


16.    General


16.1.    Milan Direct reserves the right to make changes to the Milan Direct Website and Order Terms and Conditions without notice.


16.2.    Any provision of this Agreement which is void or unenforceable may be severed from this Agreement without affecting the enforceability of other provisions.


16.3.    A failure or delay by Milan Direct to exercise a power or right under this Agreement does not operate as a waiver of that power or right, and the exercise of a power or right by Milan Direct does not preclude its future ability to exercise that or any other power or right.


 BACK TO TOP

title: Privacy Policy UK
content:
Milan Direct Privacy Policy

 

 

www.milandirect.co.uk, referred to below as Milan Direct, is an online retailer of consumer goods.

 

At Milan Direct, we value our relationship with you and the other users of this website. We recognize that you may be concerned about our collection, use, and disclosure of your personally identifiable information that we may collect when you use the Web Site. Accordingly, we have implemented this Privacy Policy to inform you of the information that we collect from you, how we collect this information, and what we do with it after we collect it. If you have any questions or comments regarding this Privacy Policy, please contact us at: sales@milandirect.com.au

 

 

Milan Direct’s Commitment to Online Security

 

At Milan Direct, your personal information is treated with the greatest of care. Sensitive payment information such as credit card details is NEVER stored on the Internet with our system. Once you type your information, it is sent instantly, encrypted, direct to our order processing system. We employ the latest 1024-bit encryption technology in all areas of the site which require you to provide payment information. This is done to protect you from unauthorized use of the information you are sending to our server. This website is registered with site identification authorities to enable your browser to confirm our security identity before any transmission is sent. With this technology, the identity of this site is automatically confirmed behind the scenes prior to the transmission of any sensitive information requested to complete an online order. This also ensures that your data reaches your intended target or your browser notifies you that the potential receiving site looks suspicious and should be avoided.


Physical, electronic and managerial procedures have been employed to safeguard the security and integrity of personal information. The Milan Direct website encrypts sensitive information wherever Milan Direct requests it.

 

 

Email Newsletter Subscription

 

All our newsletters contain a link to unsubscribe. You will not receive newsletters from us again if you choose to unsubscribe. In order to make our emails more relevant and useful to you, our servers may receive a confirmation when you open email from us.

 

 

Being Included In and Removed From Our Email Newsletters

 

You will be included in our email newsletter mailing list (which include special offers, competitions, new product arrival alerts and other communication related to our services or the products we offer) if you subscribe to our newsletter or if you make a purchase from us or have requested that we notify you of an items expected arrival and we expect to receive other items that are similar or complimentary. Every newsletter we send has an unsubscribe option in the newsletter. This will always be clear and easy to locate. You may unsubscribe from any mailing list whenever you wish and you will be immediately removed as per your request. You also have the option of emailing unsubscribe@milandirect.com.au and a member of our Customer Service Team will unsubscribe you if you provide them with the email address that is subscribed.

 

 

Personal Information that Milan Direct May Collect Online

 

Milan Direct collects personal information online, including names, postal and e-mail addresses, phone numbers and billing information.



How Milan Direct Uses Personal Information Collected Online


We will use your personal information only for the purpose of processing your order and to communicate effectively with you. This communication includes but is not limited to; emailing you tax invoices, dispatch and tracking information, returns and exchange authorisations, etc. As a condition of sale we reserve the right to email you special offer promotions that we believe will be of interest to you. You may, once you have placed your order, advise us that you are not interested in these offers and we will consequently not send these to you. To do this, please send this request to unsubscribe@milandirect.com.au.com.au. In any event, you may, at any time, unsubscribe from any special offer promotions we send you, and your unsubscribe request will be actioned immediately.

 

 

How Your Information May Be Shared

 

We never sell or rent your personal information. Milan Direct may release personal information under the following circumstances:

 

  • Where release is required by law (for example, a subpoena) or regulation or is requested by a government agency;
  • Where our records indicate a company or an individual may be engaged in fraudulent activity or other deceptive practices that a governmental agency should be made aware of;
  • To appropriate persons, where your communication suggests possible harm to others

 

 

Computer Tracking and Cookies

 

This website is not set up to track, collect or distribute personal information not entered by visitors. Our site logs do generate certain kinds of non-identifying site usage data, such as the number of hits and visits to our sites. This information is used for internal purposes by technical support staff to provide better services to the public and may also be provided to others, but again, the statistics contain no personal information and cannot be used to gather such information.

 

 

Changes to this Privacy Notice, Conditions of Use and Notices

 

This Privacy Notice and our Terms of Use may change over time and the use of information which we gather now is subject to these Notices and Terms as modified. If you visit our Web site, your visit and any dispute over privacy is subject to this Notice and our Legal Notices, including the application of the laws of the State of Victoria, Australia.

title: Warranty Information
meta_description: Milan Direct is the #1 Online Store for Art Deco Furniture, Online Furniture and Retro Furniture, specialising in Modern Classic Designer Furniture, providing classic designs at affordable prices to England, Scotland, Ireland & all of the UK.
content:
Milan Direct was born out of a 60 year passion for furniture!

CEO and co-Founder Dean Ramler’s family has been making furniture in Australia since the 1950’s and it is Dean’s strong background in the furniture industry which led to the creation of Milan Direct, pioneering the concept of selling furniture purely through an online only channel.
Dean’s passion for furniture and family upbringing in the industry, has allowed Milan Direct to offer the best quality furniture in the market at never before seen prices.
Dean is proud to continue the family tradition of furniture making, delivered via a more efficient business model better suited to today’s highly educated consumers.
When shopping at Milan Direct, rest assured you are dealing with furniture lovers and experts!
Today, Milan Direct is Australia's Largest Online Furniture Retailer with over 300,000 highly satisfied customers served and over 1,000,000 products sold Australia wide.
sMilan Direct is an Australian based company, with operations in Australia, UK and Europe.
Milan Direct is Australia's largest Online Furniture Retailer and Australia's fastest growing Furniture Retailer (as reported in BRW and AFR). Shop with confidence at Milan Direct.
Milan Direct is a highly awarded and recognised company both in Australia and the UK.
Furniture Supplier for the London Olympics Milan Direct is proud to have supplied furniture to the London 2012 Olympics as well as the Glasgow Commonwealth Games in 2014!
To learn more about Milan Direct and what journalists around the world are saying about us right now:
http://www.milandirect.com.au/news-and-media
{{block type="cms/block" block_id="static_right_gallery"}} {{block type="cms/block" block_id="static_bottom_gallery"}}
 

1. Milan Direct is proudly 100% Australian owned, and pioneered the concept of selling furniture purely through an online channel in Australia.

2. Milan Direct is Australia's largest Online Furniture Retailer and Australia's fastest growing Furniture Retailer (as reported in BRW and AFR). Shop with confidence at Milan Direct.

3. We have cut out all middleman and deliver the product direct to our customers, which has created never before seen prices in Australia.

4. Shop risk free with our 30-Day Money Back Guarantee.

Matt Blatt Price Comparison

For a full list of all Milan Direct websites please visit: http://www.milandirect.com.au/domain/

We welcome all feedback and if you wish to get in touch, please contact us via Twitter, Facebook or email.

title: Milan Direct Help Centre
content:
Help Centre

Need help? The Milan Direct Help Centre is here to assist with your queries!

 

  • Q: I would like to view the Milan Direct range of products - Do you have a showroom or store?

    Milan Direct is an internet business and for that reason we do not have a showroom or a store to view our products. By eliminating these overheads we are able offer prices far lower than traditional retailers and other online retailers who have expensive showrooms that add to the cost of your purchase!


    Shop with confidence at Milan Direct as all products are backed with a 30 Day Money Back Guarantee and 12 Month Warranty! Extended Warranty options are also available for added piece of mind.

  • Q. I bought a Milan Direct product some time ago. If I buy the same item now, will it be identical to the model I currently have?

    We are constantly manufacturing stock to replenish our inventory. Whilst items generally follow identical production methods, we are always refining the manufacturing process and as such there may be some slight variations if a large amount of time has elapsed.


    If you are interested in adding some more Milan Direct products to your collection, please get in touch and we can let you know if there have been any changes.

  • Q. Do you offer discounts for bulk purchases?

    Yes, we do! For queries relating to bulk purchases please email our commercial division at commercial@milandirect.co.uk.

  • Q. How can I find information on a specific product?

    Every product listing on our website contains a section titled "Overview & Specifications" which can be found underneath the product image and pricing. This section contains in depth information on the product including dimensions, materials, operating procedures, key features, and more.


    If you have a specific question relating to a product that isn't answered in the Overview & Specifications section, please email us at sales@milandirect.co.uk with the product name and query and we will get an answer for you!

  • Q. Why sign up to the Newsletter?

    By signing up to the newsletter you will be first to hear about all new product releases, sales, promotions and Milan Direct news!


    We also provide these benefits to our facebook fans so be sure to like Milan Direct on facebook to stay up to date.

  • Q: Is VAT included in the purchase price?

    VAT is included in the product price where applicable

  • Q: What is Milan Direct's VAT number?

    VAT: 975031028

 

  • Q: What payment methods are accepted?

    We offer payment via Direct Deposit, PayPal, or Credit Card (Visa, MasterCard) without surcharge.

  • Q: Do you require payment in full before you can dispatch my order?

    Yes, we can only dispatch an order once payment has been received in full. Please keep this in mind if paying via bank deposit as your order will be held until funds are processed.

  • Q: How do I go about acquiring a Discount Code?

    From time to time we release promotional discount codes to members of our mailing list and fans of our facebook page. To be first to know of any Milan Direct sales or promotions you can subscribe to our mailing list on any page of our website and can find us on facebook here.

  • Q: If I purchase a Milan Direct product, will I be supplied with a Tax Invoice?

    The Order Confirmation email that you receive when you make an order is a valid UK Tax Invoice. If you have lost your invoice we will be happy to email you a new one. Simply email our sales team on sales@milandirect.co.uk with your request.

  • Q: Is it safe to make Credit Card payments online?

    The Milan Direct website uses SSL Encryption and has the VeriSign Secured Seal.


    All payments made on the Milan Direct website are processed by the eWay Payment Gateway which is highly reliable and secure.

 

  • Q: Can I pick-up my order?

    Orders can be picked up from our warehouse in the UK using your preferred professional carrier. Please contact us at sales@milandirect.co.uk to arrange for the pick-up of your order.


    Please note that due to OH&S requirements, only professional carriers can be used to pick up an order from our warehouse.

  • Q: Where can Milan Direct ship their products?

    Milan Direct provides extremely fast and cost effective shipping right across the UK. 95% of items are dispatched within 24 hours of payment!


    We are now able to ship to the mainland USA! To obtain a quote for delivery, please email us at sales@milandirect.co.uk with a list of the items you are interested in as well as your intended delivery address. We will respond promptly with a quote on delivery.


    Please note that for EU customers outside the UK, the customer is the exporter from the UK and is responsible for delivery of the order outside the UK including any further costs, taxes, duties or insurance, either by arranging for their own carrier to pick up from our warehouse, or by selecting the delivery option at checkout provided by Milan Direct on behalf of the customer. The delivery option available at checkout is via the carrier DHL and the terms of the service are available on request by the customer.

  • Q: Does your postage fee include insurance?

    Yes, for UK based customers, freight costs include full insurance.

  • Q: How much is delivery?

    To easily calculate your delivery cost add the items you intend to purchase to the cart and proceed to the checkout screen. Before proceeding to the order section of the checkout you are able to calculate delivery charge via our shipping calculator. Simply enter country and postcode of destination and the calculator will provide you with a delivery cost!


    As the UK's #1 Online Furniture Retailer, we are able to negotiate the best rates available. We trust that you will find that our combined product and shipping prices are very competitive.

  • Q: How long will delivery take after dispatch?

    Typical delivery times expected are:

    • *United Kingdom - Approximately 1-5 business days
    • *Europe - Approximately 3-7 business days

  • Q: Does someone need to be home to accept delivery?

    We strongly recommend someone being available to accept delivery as we use a secure courier who requires a signature as proof of receipt. For your convenience, we recommend having your order sent to your work address if being at home during business hours is not an option.

  • Q: How do I track the progress of my delivery?

    By close of business on the day your order has been dispatched, you will receive an email from our courier with full tracking details and information so that you can monitor your order online and in real time if tracking is available.

  • For more information on delivery please click here.

 

  • Q: What are your Warranty Terms and Conditions?

    Milan Direct warrants all goods for a period of 12 months under normal usage, to be free from defects in material and workmanship. Milan Direct’s liability under this warranty is to repair or replace (at its discretion) any part or product covered by this (or any implied) warranty free of charge.


    This warranty does not cover:

    • 1. Normal wear and tear;
    • 2. Damage arising from abnormal use, or abuse;
    • 3. Products which have not been maintained, or which have been modified;
    • 4. Any indirect or consequential loss.

    This warranty applies only to the original purchase. Proof of purchase is required. All works carried out by a party under instructions from Milan Direct will be covered by the 12 month warranty on workmanship and repair. If the workmanship of the repair is deemed by Milan Direct to be faulty a new item will be provided. All other warranties, express or implied, are excluded.

  • Q: How long is your warranty?

    All Milan Direct products are backed by a 12 month comprehensive warranty. For extra peace of mind, we also offer extended warranty options on all products.

  • Q: What do I do if I have a problem?

    Milan Direct is committed to the excellence of our products and providing first class customer service coupled with unbeatable value!


    A very responsive after sales department is available to help you with any queries after your purchase. We aim to resolve any issues as soon as possible and in a reasonable time frame. Contact us at support@milandirect.co.uk if you require any assistance with your product after purchase.

 

 

Still needing an answer for your query? The Milan Direct customer service team are ready to assist!

 

 

Contact Information

 

 

Sales Enquiries: sales@milandirect.co.uk

 

Commercial Orders: commercial@milandirect.co.uk

 

Media Enquiries: media@milandirect.co.uk

 

Support: support@milandirect.co.uk

 

 

UK Warehouse: Old Leicester Road, Swift Park, Rugby CV21 1DZ

Admin Office: 108 Bridport St, Albert Park, Australia.

title: Milan Direct - Warranty Information
content:
Q: How Long Is Your Warranty?
All Milan Direct products are backed by a 12 month comprehensive warranty. For extra peace of mind, we also offer extended warranty options on all products (2 or 3 years) which can be purchased at checkout.

 

Q: What do I do if I have a problem?
Milan Direct is committed to the excellence of our products and providing first class customer service coupled with unbeatable value.


If your product arrives or presents with damage or a fault within the warranty period, please email us at support@milandirect.co.uk and provide:

 

  • A detailed description of the damage or fault; and
  • Photos (or video, where appropriate) showing the damage or fault.


A very responsive after sales department will usually respond within 24 business hours.

 


Q: What are your Warranty Terms and Conditions?
Milan Direct warrants all goods for the period of the warranty under normal usage, to be free from defects in material and workmanship. Milan Direct’s liability under this warranty is to repair or replace (at its discretion) any part or product covered by this warranty free of charge.


This warranty does not cover:

 

  1. Normal wear and tear;
  2. Damage arising from abnormal use, or abuse;
  3. Products which have not been maintained, or which have been modified;
  4. Any indirect or consequential loss.


This warranty applies only to the original purchase. Proof of purchase is required. All works carried out by a party under instructions from Milan Direct will be covered by the 12 month warranty on workmanship and repair. If the workmanship of the repair is deemed by Milan Direct to be faulty a new item will be provided.


Milan Direct does not consider the following to be covered by this warranty:

 

  • Damage to packaging only;
  • Insignificant variations in dimensions, colour, grain or finish (as between a received product and an advertised product); and
  • Minor chips or superficial blemishes.


The customer acknowledges that packaging may be affected during delivery to the customer, and that there may be minor variations in colour and finish as between each item and the corresponding images shown on the Milan Direct website. No two pieces of furniture are identical!



For further details regarding warranties, please see here
